history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or walking directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Pittsburgh Paint Arena
TTS Okay, going to ppg paints arena parking south lot. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER 2 P.M.
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 22 minutes, and you will take 1 bus. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to You are now hearing the routes in <break time='500ms'/>  Visually Impaired mode </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Start at Location 1. Go west on FORBES AVENUE toward SOUTH CRAIG STREET, and then cross the street on <break strength='strong'/>SOUTH CRAIG STREET </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
